TopicTitle: I need help Installing Romfarers Lazor system on .21

Articles.Content:
I keep re-installing and it says in the loading screen it is loading them but it is'nt... is it something to do with one of the mods I am using?

List of mods that may be Detrimental-

Hollow structures & hulls

Kosmos Space station parts

Boat parts

And last The

kethane mod
you can only use the mod if you target the docking port on the ship you want to dock on and if you have a docking port on the other ship

Make sure you put the Romfarer folder into KSP/GameData and the SPH folder into KSP/Ships. Do not touch or move the folders in any other way

Edited August 21, 2013 by brians200

I am having some weird occurrence with Romfarer. it seems to be working mostly but when I open the menu screens I can not get them to close again and I can not open the control panel that has the directional controls for the tractor beam. the menus do not have borders and there dose not seem to be a full array of functional switches on the menus. any help out there? thanks! I think some thing is not quite right with my install

Holy necro!!

You should be called James the thread necroer!!!
